PASSWORD_LENGTH: Password must be at least 6 characters long
INVALID_PARAMETERS: Sorry, the request could not be processed as because of invalid parameters.
NOT_ALLOWED:
Sorry, the action you tried to perform is not allowed.
If you feel this is not correct, kindly call support.
NOT_AUTHORIZED: Sorry, you are not authorized to perform this action.
NOT_FOUND:
Sorry, no entry could be found for the specified criteria.
If you feel this is not correct, kindly call support.
PASSWORD_NOT_UPDATED: Some error occurred while changing the password
USER_EXIST: User already exist in the system
USER_NOT_EXIST: User does not exist in the system
GENERAL_EROOR: Sorry! Something went wrong with the request. Please try again later.
BAD_REQUEST: Bad request. Please check your input and try again.
VENDOR_EXIST: Vendor already exist in the system
VENDOR_EMAIL_EXIST_DIFF_USER: Email already exist in the system with different User
VENDOR_NOT_EXIST: Vendor does not exist in the system
CUSTOMER_EXIST: Customer already exists in the system
CUSTOMER_NOT_EXIST: Customer does not exist in the system
BRAND_EXIST: Brand already exists in the system
BRAND_NOT_EXIST: Brand does not exist in the system
INVENTRY_TYPE_EXIST: InventryType already exists in the system
INVENTRY_TYPE_NOT_EXIST: InventryType does not exist in the system
INVENTRY_SERIAL_EXIST: Serial Number already exists in the system
INVENTORY_NOT_EXIST: Inventory does not exist in the system
